Package de.sub.goobi.helper.tasks

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    INameableTask
    A task implementing this interface provides its readable name by a method call.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateNewspaperProcessesTask
    The class CreateNewspaperProcessesTask is a LongRunningTask to create processes from a course of appearance.
    CreatePdfFromServletThread
    Creation of PDF-Files as long running task for GoobiContentServerServlet.
    EmptyTask
    The class EmptyTask is the base class for worker threads that operate independently to do the work in the background.
    ExportDmsTask
    The class ExportDmsTask accepts an ExportDms for a process and provides the ability to run the export in the background this way.
    ExportNewspaperBatchTask  
    ExportSerialBatchTask
    Thread implementation to export a batch holding a serial publication as set, cross-over inserting METS pointer references to the respective other volumes in the anchor file.
    LongRunningTask Deprecated
    New task implementations should directly implement EmptyTask.
    TaskManager
    The class TaskManager serves to handle the execution of threads.
    TaskSitter
    The class TaskSitter takes care of the tasks in the task manager.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EmptyTask.Behaviour
    The enum Actions lists the available instructions to the housekeeper what to do with a terminated thread.
